remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會判斷是否會將此物件寫入組態檔中。This method determines whether this object is written to the configuration file. 如果傳回值為 `false`，則假設此組態檔表示目前的項目之狀態。If the return value is `false`, it is assumed that the configuration file represents the current state of the element. 根據預設，在透過此物件的索引子設定屬性之後，此屬性會傳回 `true`。By default, this property returns `true` after a property is set through the indexer to this object. 您應覆寫此方法，以提供此項目的狀態之自訂指示。You should override this method to provide custom indication of the state of this element.

span.span: A enumerated value that determines which property values to include.

summary.span: 回復從組態階層架構的不同層級合併組態資訊所造成的影響。

span.span: Reverses the effect of merging configuration information from different levels of the configuration hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法會回復從組態階層架構的不同層級合併組態資訊所造成的影響。This method reverses the effect of merging configuration information from different levels of the configuration hierarchy. 這允許在序列化之前，在目前階層架構層級上設定的組態可以設定為與不同於父層級上的設定。This allows configuration set at the current hierarchy level to be differentiated from that set at parent levels, before serialization. 系統在新的暫存項目上呼叫此方法，以比較父物件與來源物件。This method is called by the system on a new temporary element to compare the parent object and the source object. 基於 `saveMode` 值，它會在稍後設定暫存物件，以包含必須序列化的資料。Based on the `saveMode` value, it then sets the temporary object to contain the data that must be serialized. 儲存模式的相關資訊，請參閱。For more information about save modes, see .
